Summary: object flew over house. had blueish aura all around it. could only see outline of craft.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Castor
There was one other sighting in Castor on or around October 15th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailswas outside cleaning out pickup truck, walked toward porch, bright blue light caught my eye, stopped and watched as craft flew from over house toward NW. ran inside, got my wife, but it was gone. hours later, heard loud boom, shook house, news channel reports the same in 40 or so mile raius of my house. NWS reports debris cloud, and debris plume of mile high around dixie inn louisiana. drew as detailed a picture as i could. did not scare me, no terrifyinf feeling, glow was almost warm in nature.
